archimate:BusinessObject.name: Organizational process performance measures needs
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Identification of the organizational process performance measures, which measure how well the organization is satisfying it objectives

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: Der Bedarf an Leistungskennzahlen der Organisationsprozesse umfasst die Leistungsmessdaten der Organisationsprozesse, die messen, wie gut die Organisation ihre Ziele erfüllt.
Identification of the organizational process performance measures, which measure how well the organization is satisfying it objectives
